title: Support E2E testing with EOS for NE3 contacts
description:
Description
Process information:
Requirements:
Support EOS-testing for maintaining "NE3 location/site contact" in EOS
Solve, implement and deploy bugs
Implement and deploy ad-hoc requirements stemming from testing

Bugs have been solved and deployed
Possible ad-hoc requirements have been implemented and deployed
